post.body: Who knew? Go Vikes!
last week i was at walmart and saw the pip display 2day i was in walmart and now its a stamps.com display
watching the Vikings slowing self destruct...
Watching Man on Wire - but the closed captions aren't working so I'm only getting about half of it. :)
Watching Dangerous Minds... that's right old school!
getting ready for Christmas dinner. lutefisk for some, walleye for the rest.
getting ready to blow snow again....
Burn'n "Black Books" for Troy...
Kick'n Jake's butt at Foosball! yeah that's right. Kick'n It.
Dang thats a lot of snow, sure glad I got that snow blower. Prolly gonna have to do it again tomorrow morning .
playing Cribbage with Suzy during the blizzard.
Antonio Bryant just got me into the fantasy playoffs!! now i'm in the playoffs in both my leagues. Go Captain Awesome!
Oh and Troy - Drink'n a beer. Miller Genuine Draft Light this time, and its good.
Just got home from another Momma and Papa class... things you don't want to know. Now i'm drink'n a beer and check'n football stats.
drink one of jakes home brews mmm mmm good
drink'n one of jakes home brews
decorating the Christmas tree
Just hooked up my new router... fun!
take'n a day off and loving it already been to Paramont sports checkn out the single speeds and the liquor store
taking another crap... you did want to know that!
